price: 5. L’alternance de la nuit et du jour, le bienfait[497] qu’Allah envoie du ciel pour faire revivre la terre déjà morte, la répartition des vents, sont autant de Signes pour des gens qui savent raisonner.
arabic: وَٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مِن رِّزۡقٖ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَا وَتَصۡرِيفِ ٱلرِّيَٰحِ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: [497] Il s’agit ici de la pluie selon les exégètes.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri wamā anzala al-lahu mina al-samāi min riz'qin fa-aḥyā bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā wataṣrīfi al-riyāḥi āyātun liqawmin yaʿqilūna
